abstract: Iranian Pres Hassan Rouhani has come under increasing criticism from hard-liners due to Rouhani's comments about future of country after signing of nuclear deal; Rouhani has criticized conservative media and called for more freedom for the press.
lead_paragraph: A loose alliance of clerics, politicians and commanders has been insistent that the nuclear deal has changed nothing in relations between the Iran and the United States.

headline.main: Hard-Liners in Iran Denounce President Hassan Rouhani in Standoff
headline.print_headline: Hard-Liners in Standoff With Iran’s President

snippet: A loose alliance of clerics, politicians and commanders has been insistent that the nuclear deal has changed nothing in relations between the Iran and the United States.
